content: are you after a fun and cozy garment that ll knit up in a flash well the cloud cardi is just the ticket with big puffy sleeves and a slightly cropped body this bomber style cardi pairs great with jeans and skirts and is excellent for some at-home cozy comfort worked up in pieces on big chunky needles this knit is a perfect project for newbie knitters and those who just want that new garment finished now the pattern includes detailed-yet-simple instructions and there s no tricky shaping to worry about so what are you waiting for grab yourself some cozy wool and chunky needles and cast on today materials & sizing **sizes ** xxs xs s sm m l xl xxl **to fit bust ** 68 74 80 86 94 103 110 118 cm / 27 29 31 5 34 37 40 43 46 inches **finished bust ** 82 88 94 100 108 117 124 132 cm / 32 34 5 37 39 5 43 46 49 52 inches this is measured as the full circumference around the body including the open-front gap and is designed to fit with between 10-16cm / 4-6 of positive ease pictured here in size sm worn on a 90cm bust with 10cm positive ease **yarn ** any 20ply / super bulky weight yarn we used super woolly 100m/200g in colour rust bucket **quantity ** approximately 376 436 497 543 632 708 773 860 metres **needle ** 7 00mm and 10 00mm 80cm circular needles or extra long straight needles adjust needle size as necessary to match pattern gauge **gauge ** 8sts to 10cm in garter stitch on larger needles > **errata 04/05/2023** > there was a small error in the length for the front panels to be knitted the line should read **repeat this row until the front measures 42 45 49 53 57 61 65 69 cm from cast on or until it matches the back ** the pattern version has now been updated with this change to v1 2
